ygData.subject: Re: soloing
ygData.msgSnippet: First the tentacle whip is not a good weapon IMO, and second, I guess we cannot answer that without knowing what kind of MOBs you re fighting, using what
ygData.messageBody:
First the tentacle whip is not a good weapon IMO, and second, I guess we
cannot answer that without knowing what kind of MOBs you're fighting, using
what song(s).

Thormael

>From: "Janko S." <janko@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
>Subject: [eqbards] soloing
>Date: Wed, 6 Oct 1999 22:37:54 +0200
>
>Hi all
>
>When I play EQ I allways get asked to play the Jig to increase mana
>regeneration. I was asked this for 4 times today and I really hate it. I
>even got kicked from a group when I refused to play it because the mana is
>not regenerating faster. Can anyone recommend me what to do?
>I have one more problem. I'm lvl 15 at the moment and I can hardly ever
>solo
>a blue creature. I'm wearing full banded armor, and I have my 1H slash
>allways maxed. I'm using tentacle whip as a weapon, no it's not twinked I
>got it as in a bet when someone didn't beleive me that selo's is faster
>than
>sow. And I just bought the armor. Can anyone please tell me why can't I
>solo
>a blue creature without loosing 90-95% of my health.
>
>Asandir
>
>
><< text3.html >>
